root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 7-b-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: With a mandate from countries around the world, IRENA encourages governments to adopt enabling policies for renewable energy investments, provides practical tools and policy advice to accelerate renewable energy deployment, and facilitates knowledge sharing and technology transfer to provide clean, sustainable energy for the world’s growing population. Renewable energy capacity statistics are in line with these aims.
